wikipedia_page.main: Paula Jackson  (born 23 April 1986) is a British retired bobsledder who competed from 2007 to 2014. She originally started as a brakewoman for Jackie Gunn before taking up piloting.Jackson finished 11th in the two-woman event at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver alongside brakewoman Kelly Thomas, and took 12th in the same event at the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi with Rebekah Wilson.Jackson, along with Rebekah Wilson, won the world junior bobsleigh title at the Park City track in 2011. Jackson piloted the no.1 sled for Great Britain in the 2010–11 season.
